name: Hentai Gothic Girl
description:
Hentai Gothic Girl is a game that can relieve your tension, bringing pleasure with colorful art. To restore the image, you just need to assemble the puzzle by swapping the tiles.

Features of Hentai Gothic Girl:

* Unique art
* Save open images in the gallery
* Relaxing background music
* Two difficulty levels
* 100 Achievements
* The ability to open the uncensored version
* Three ways to manage the gallery
* Auto-assembly button
* Steam Cloud
* Cards are planned in the future
